name: Advanced Base (TL C)
description: Model 317 modular pressurized quarters for 6 persons, with air lock, recycler, fresher, atmosphere recirculating system, and console. The advanced base has a 6 ton displacement measuring 2 meters by 6 meters by 6 meters. It comes with 800 man-days' worth of food. Power is provided by an integral Fusion+ unit for up to one year. Advanced bases can be carried in the hold of starship.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
